weekly_top_story.headline: President Trump to meet Russian President Putin in Hungary for second summit amid Ukraine war discussions
weekly_top_story.summary: Following a high-stakes phone call, President Trump and Russian President Putin have agreed to a second summit in Hungary to negotiate an end to the war in Ukraine, signaling a potential diplomatic breakthrough in an ongoing major conflict with global repercussions.

stories.headline: Former National Security Adviser John Bolton indicted on charges of mishandling classified documents
stories.summary: A federal grand jury has indicted John Bolton on allegations of unlawfully transmitting and retaining classified materials, marking a significant development in U.S. political and legal affairs.

stories.headline: U.S. military conducts show of force with B-52 bombers near Venezuela's coast amid tensions
stories.summary: The U.S. deployed B-52 bombers for hours off Venezuela's coast as part of a military buildup of 10,000 troops in the region responding to ongoing political and security tensions.

stories.headline: Judge mandates body cameras for some ICE agents after violent clashes during immigration enforcement
stories.summary: In response to recent violent confrontations during immigration crackdowns, a judge ordered certain ICE agents to wear body cameras, aiming to increase accountability and transparency.
